General.Name: BitDice
General.Description: BitDice Casino — это существующее и прибыльно действующее казино с криптовалютами, которое хочет превратиться в платформу нового поколения для онлайн-игр.

ICO.Description:
BitDice Casino is a established and profitably operating cryptocurrency casino that is seeking capital contributions from the public to transform itself into a new-generation platform for online gaming experience.

The CSNO token will be exchangeable on the BitDice Casino website and tradable on multiple cryptocurrency exchanges.

Team:

Marielos Melendez Hernandez: CEO.

BitDice Casino will be holding its ICO on August 15, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 70% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 68,000,000 tokens available at the offering. The ICO funding target is 10,000,000 USD and is expected to end on September 15, 2017.

Token Reserve Split (32%):

  • 30% Team;
  • 02% Bounties;

BitDice Casino's ICO will feature a bounty campaign, and the token will not be mineable.
